==Discontinuation==
==Discontinuation==
{{Main|Microsoft Security Essentials}}
{{Main|Microsoft Security Essentials}}
â
In early December of 2008 Microsoft announced the development on an antivirus product code named "Morro", officially titled Microsoft Security Essentials. The Freeware program will replace both Windows Defender and [[Windows Live OneCare]]. OneCare will be discontinued by the end of June 2009 and Windows Defender will be discontinued by the end of summer 2009. Current users will continue to get the latest Malware definition files until the end of the summer.
+
In early December of 2008 Microsoft announced the development on an antivirus product code named "Morro", officially titled [[Microsoft Security Essentials]]. The Freeware program will replace both Windows Defender and [[Windows Live OneCare]]. OneCare will be discontinued by the end of June 2009 and Windows Defender will be discontinued by the end of summer 2009. Current users will continue to get the latest Malware definition files until the end of the summer.
